There is a category of five star and Michelin restaurants that are in a category of their own.  I can only pick a handful of restaurants that fit in this category, at this point in my life I can only pick four or five, and that I can call one of the best meals of my life.  Everything was perfect.   French technique perfected.   All the plates and flavors were very complex.  The staff was very accommodating and friendly.  I'd go to Barcelona just to eat here, seriously.
